title: AWS Import/Export
description: AWS Import/Export Service AWS Import/Export accelerates transferring large amounts of data between the AWS cloud and portable storage devices that you mail to us. AWS Import/Export transfers data directly onto and off of your storage devices using Amazon's high-speed internal network and bypassing the Internet. For large data sets, AWS Import/Export is often faster than Internet transfer and more cost effective than upgrading your connectivity.

APIVersion.description: Specifies the version of the client tool.
APIVersion.title: APIVersion

Artifact.description: A discrete item that contains the description and URL of an artifact (such as a PDF).
Artifact.title: Artifact

BucketPermissionException.description: The account specified does not have the appropriate bucket permissions.
BucketPermissionException.title: BucketPermissionException

CancelJobInput.description: Input structure for the CancelJob operation.
CancelJobInput.title: CancelJobInput

CancelJobOutput.description: Output structure for the CancelJob operation.
CancelJobOutput.title: CancelJobOutput

CanceledJobIdException.description: The specified job ID has been canceled and is no longer valid.
CanceledJobIdException.title: CanceledJobIdException

Carrier.description: Name of the shipping company. This value is included when the LocationCode is "Returned".
Carrier.title: Carrier

CreateJobInput.description: Input structure for the CreateJob operation.
CreateJobInput.title: CreateJobInput

CreateJobOutput.description: Output structure for the CreateJob operation.
CreateJobOutput.title: CreateJobOutput

CreateJobQuotaExceededException.description: Each account can create only a certain number of jobs per day. If you need to create more than this, please contact awsimportexport@amazon.com to explain your particular use case.
CreateJobQuotaExceededException.title: CreateJobQuotaExceededException

CreationDate.description: Timestamp of the CreateJob request in ISO8601 date format. For example "2010-03-28T20:27:35Z".
CreationDate.title: CreationDate

CurrentManifest.description: The last manifest submitted, which will be used to process the job.
CurrentManifest.title: CurrentManifest

Description.description: The associated description for this object.
Description.title: Description

ErrorCount.description: Number of errors. We return this value when the ProgressCode is Success or SuccessWithErrors.
ErrorCount.title: ErrorCount

ErrorMessage.description: The human-readable description of a particular error.
ErrorMessage.title: ErrorMessage

ExpiredJobIdException.description: Indicates that the specified job has expired out of the system.
ExpiredJobIdException.title: ExpiredJobIdException

GetStatusInput.description: Input structure for the GetStatus operation.
GetStatusInput.title: GetStatusInput

GetStatusOutput.description: Output structure for the GetStatus operation.
GetStatusOutput.title: GetStatusOutput

InvalidAccessKeyIdException.description: The AWS Access Key ID specified in the request did not match the manifest's accessKeyId value. The manifest and the request authentication must use the same AWS Access Key ID.
InvalidAccessKeyIdException.title: InvalidAccessKeyIdException

InvalidAddressException.description: The address specified in the manifest is invalid.
InvalidAddressException.title: InvalidAddressException

InvalidCustomsException.description: One or more customs parameters was invalid. Please correct and resubmit.
InvalidCustomsException.title: InvalidCustomsException

InvalidFileSystemException.description: File system specified in export manifest is invalid.
InvalidFileSystemException.title: InvalidFileSystemException

InvalidJobIdException.description: The JOBID was missing, not found, or not associated with the AWS account.
InvalidJobIdException.title: InvalidJobIdException

InvalidManifestFieldException.description: One or more manifest fields was invalid. Please correct and resubmit.
InvalidManifestFieldException.title: InvalidManifestFieldException

InvalidParameterException.description: One or more parameters had an invalid value.
InvalidParameterException.title: InvalidParameterException

InvalidVersionException.description: The client tool version is invalid.
InvalidVersionException.title: InvalidVersionException

IsCanceled.description: Indicates whether the job was canceled.
IsCanceled.title: IsCanceled

IsTruncated.description: Indicates whether the list of jobs was truncated. If true, then call ListJobs again using the last JobId element as the marker.
IsTruncated.title: IsTruncated

Job.description: Representation of a job returned by the ListJobs operation.
Job.title: Job

JobId.description: A unique identifier which refers to a particular job.
JobId.title: JobId

JobType.description: Specifies whether the job to initiate is an import or export job.
JobType.title: JobType

JobsList.description: A list container for Jobs returned by the ListJobs operation.
JobsList.title: JobsList

ListJobsInput.description: Input structure for the ListJobs operation.
ListJobsInput.title: ListJobsInput

ListJobsOutput.description: Output structure for the ListJobs operation.
ListJobsOutput.title: ListJobsOutput

LocationCode.description: A token representing the location of the storage device, such as "AtAWS".
LocationCode.title: LocationCode

LocationMessage.description: A more human readable form of the physical location of the storage device.
LocationMessage.title: LocationMessage

LogBucket.description: Amazon S3 bucket for user logs.
LogBucket.title: LogBucket

LogKey.description: The key where the user logs were stored.
LogKey.title: LogKey

Manifest.description: The UTF-8 encoded text of the manifest file.
Manifest.title: Manifest

Marker.description: Specifies the JOBID to start after when listing the jobs created with your account. AWS Import/Export lists your jobs in reverse chronological order. See MaxJobs.
Marker.title: Marker

MaxJobs.description: Sets the maximum number of jobs returned in the response. If there are additional jobs that were not returned because MaxJobs was exceeded, the response contains <IsTruncated>true</IsTruncated>. To return the additional jobs, see Marker.
MaxJobs.title: MaxJobs

MissingCustomsException.description: One or more required customs parameters was missing from the manifest.
MissingCustomsException.title: MissingCustomsException

MissingManifestFieldException.description: One or more required fields were missing from the manifest file. Please correct and resubmit.
MissingManifestFieldException.title: MissingManifestFieldException

MissingParameterException.description: One or more required parameters was missing from the request.
MissingParameterException.title: MissingParameterException

MultipleRegionsException.description: Your manifest file contained buckets from multiple regions. A job is restricted to buckets from one region. Please correct and resubmit.
MultipleRegionsException.title: MultipleRegionsException

NoSuchBucketException.description: The specified bucket does not exist. Create the specified bucket or change the manifest's bucket, exportBucket, or logBucket field to a bucket that the account, as specified by the manifest's Access Key ID, has write permissions to.
NoSuchBucketException.title: NoSuchBucketException

ProgressCode.description: A token representing the state of the job, such as "Started".
ProgressCode.title: ProgressCode

ProgressMessage.description: A more human readable form of the job status.
ProgressMessage.title: ProgressMessage

Signature.description: An encrypted code used to authenticate the request and response, for example, "DV+TpDfx1/TdSE9ktyK9k/bDTVI=". Only use this value is you want to create the signature file yourself. Generally you should use the SignatureFileContents value.
Signature.title: Signature

SignatureFileContents.description: The actual text of the SIGNATURE file to be written to disk.
SignatureFileContents.title: SignatureFileContents

Success.description: Specifies whether (true) or not (false) AWS Import/Export updated your job.
Success.title: Success

TrackingNumber.description: The shipping tracking number assigned by AWS Import/Export to the storage device when it's returned to you. We return this value when the LocationCode is "Returned".
TrackingNumber.title: TrackingNumber

URL.description: The URL for a given Artifact.
URL.title: URL

UnableToCancelJobIdException.description: AWS Import/Export cannot cancel the job
UnableToCancelJobIdException.title: UnableToCancelJobIdException

UnableToUpdateJobIdException.description: AWS Import/Export cannot update the job
UnableToUpdateJobIdException.title: UnableToUpdateJobIdException

UpdateJobInput.description: Input structure for the UpateJob operation.
UpdateJobInput.title: UpdateJobInput

UpdateJobOutput.description: Output structure for the UpateJob operation.
UpdateJobOutput.title: UpdateJobOutput

ValidateOnly.description: Validate the manifest and parameter values in the request but do not actually create a job.
ValidateOnly.title: ValidateOnly

WarningMessage.description: An optional message notifying you of non-fatal issues with the job, such as use of an incompatible Amazon S3 bucket name.
WarningMessage.title: WarningMessage

city.description: Specifies the name of your city for the return address.
city.title: city

company.description: Specifies the name of the company that will ship this package.
company.title: company

country.description: Specifies the name of your country for the return address.
country.title: country

name.description: Specifies the name of the person responsible for shipping this package.
name.title: name

phoneNumber.description: Specifies the phone number of the person responsible for shipping this package.
phoneNumber.title: phoneNumber

postalCode.description: Specifies the postal code for the return address.
postalCode.title: postalCode

stateOrProvince.description: Specifies the name of your state or your province for the return address.
stateOrProvince.title: stateOrProvince

street1.description: Specifies the first part of the street address for the return address, for example 1234 Main Street.
street1.title: street1

street2.description: Specifies the optional second part of the street address for the return address, for example Suite 100.
street2.title: street2

street3.description: Specifies the optional third part of the street address for the return address, for example c/o Jane Doe.
street3.title: street3
